channel.title: Server is not up and i did everything... what do i do!
channel.description: ok i downloaded the server. i got a no-ip. did the java thing. did the envirmoental control thing. downloaded no-ip thingy. and what i do run.bat this is what pops up : (The system cannot the path specified.) it says that twice then says press any key to continue... what do i do!!!! :|

item.title: Server is not up and i did everything... what do i do!
item.dc:creator: @maul_alert maul alert
item.description:
@maul_alert wrote:

then,[quote=“coolj554, post:3, topic:229340”][quote author=maul alert link=topic=301693.msg2420698#msg2420698 date=1220315204]
OK, go to run.exe, and type in " C:\Program Files\Java ", and click ok.

then, look for jdk…blahblahblah.

after that right-click the jdk version you have and press rename.

then copy the name.

after that, right click both the compiler, and the run and press edit.

press ctrl+f and type in jdk.

where ever it says c:\program files\java(this is where it should say jdk…)\bin\java.exe,
replace the stuff in-between the ()'s with the jdk type you copied.

then compile and run.
[/quote]and exactly where whould this adk be…[/quote]
okok, go to my cp, and go to c:\ and go to program files.

then look for the file named java.

your version on jdk is there… or you ddnt download it

Read full topic
item.source: Server is not up and i did everything... what do i do!

OK, go to run.exe, and type in " C:\Program Files\Java ", and click ok.

then, look for jdk…blahblahblah.

after that right-click the jdk version you have and press rename.

where ever it says c:\program files\java(this is where it should say jdk…)\bin\java.exe,

then compile and run.
